::Spears::

She saw the valley burning below.  Her spark sank in her chest.  This 
was yet, another wonderfull place, destroyed by the Predacons.  
Nothing was gained by the destruction of a wonderful place like 
that.  It was destroyed for the sake of destruction.  She turned and 
walked with Strike, her head hung low knowing that the Preds would 
not stop unill everything of beauty was killed.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Striker::
> 
> Striker nods. "I'm fine," he says, transforming into beast mode and 
landing 
> near Spears.
> 
> "Let's go," he says, taking a last look at the valley before 
turning away 
> from it, walking off toward the Ark. He sighs. Yet another place 
lost to the 
> war...
